build.extra_flags: -D BOARD_HAS_PSRAM -D WLED_USE_PSRAM_JSON -D WLED_DISABLE_ALEXA -D WLED_DISABLE_HUESYNC -D LEDPIN=2 -D IRPIN=35 -D SERVERNAME='"Sunny WLED"' -D UM_AUDIOREACTIVE_ENABLE -D SR_DMTYPE=5 -D I2S_WSPIN=13 -D I2S_SDPIN=34 -D AUDIOPIN=36 -D WLED_USE_ETHERNET -D WLED_ETH_DEFAULT=13 -D PHY_ADDR=4 -D ETH_PHY_POWER=5 -D ETH_PHY_MDC=23 -D ETH_PHY_MDIO=18 -D ETH_CLK_MODE=ETH_CLOCK_GPIO0_IN -D ETH_PHY_TYPE=ETH_PHY_KSZ8081
build.comment: variant ttgo-t7-v14-mini32 is some wrover thing. esp32-sunnyesp-v03 is actually intended but needs a custom variant created. Also, audioreactive is not compatible with DMX -D WLED_ENABLE_DMX for some reason *shocked*
